verses.verse: In that day, <WH3117> this song <WH7892> will be sung <WH7891> in the land <WH776> of Judah: <WH3063> "We have a strong <WH5797> city. <WH5892> God appoints <WH7896> salvation <WH3444> for walls <WH2346> and bulwarks. <WH2426>
Open <WH6605> the gates, <WH8179> that the righteous <WH6662> nation <WH1471> may enter: <WH935> the one which keeps <WH8104> faith. <WH529>
You will keep <WH5341> whoever <WH3336>'s mind is steadfast <WH5564> in perfect <WH7965> peace, <WH7965> because he trusts in you. <WH982>
Trust <WH982> in Yahweh <WH3068> forever; <WH5703> for in Yah, <WH3050> Yahweh, <WH3050> is an everlasting <WH5769> Rock. <WH6697>

For he has brought down <WH7817> those who dwell <WH3427> on high, <WH4791> the lofty <WH7682> city. <WH7151> He lays it low. <WH8213> He lays it low <WH8213> even to the ground. <WH776> He brings <WH5060> it even to the dust. <WH6083>
The foot <WH7272> shall tread it down; <WH7429> Even the feet <WH7272> of the poor, <WH6041> and the steps <WH6471> of the needy. <WH1800>"
The way <WH734> of the just <WH6662> is uprightness. <WH4339> You who are upright <WH3477> make <WH6424> the path <WH4570> of the righteous level. <WH6662>
Yes, <WH734> in the way of your judgments, <WH4941> Yahweh, <WH3068> have we waited <WH6960> for you. <WH8034> Your name and your renown <WH2143> are the desire <WH8378> of our soul. <WH5315>

With my soul <WH5315> have I desired <WH183> you in the night. <WH3915> Yes, <WH7307> with my spirit within <WH7130> me will I seek you earnestly; <WH7836> for when your judgments <WH4941> are in the earth, <WH776> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the world <WH8398> learn <WH3925> righteousness. <WH6664>

Let favor be shown <WH2603> to the wicked, <WH7563> yet he will not <WH1077> learn <WH3925> righteousness. <WH6664> In the land <WH776> of uprightness <WH5229> he will deal wrongfully, <WH5765> and will not <WH1077> see <WH7200> Yahweh <WH3068>'s majesty. <WH1348>

Yahweh, <WH3068> your hand <WH3027> is lifted up, <WH7311> yet they don't <WH2372> see; but they will see <WH2372> your zeal <WH7068> for the people, <WH5971> and be disappointed. <WH954> Yes, <WH784> fire will consume <WH398> your adversaries. <WH6862>
Yahweh, <WH3068> you will ordain <WH8239> peace <WH7965> for us, <WH6466> for you have also worked all our works for us. <WH4639>
Yahweh <WH113> our God, <WH430> other lords <WH3068> besides <WH2108> you have had dominion <WH1166> over us, <WH2142> but by you only will we make mention of your name. <WH8034>

The dead <WH4191> shall not live. <WH2421> The deceased <WH7496> shall not rise. <WH6965> Therefore have you visited <WH6485> and destroyed <WH8045> them, <WH2143> and caused all memory of them to perish. <WH6>

You have increased <WH3254> the nation, <WH1471> O Yahweh. <WH3068> You have increased <WH3254> the nation! <WH1471> You are glorified! <WH3513> You have enlarged <WH7368> all the borders <WH7099> of the land. <WH776>
Yahweh, <WH3068> in trouble <WH6862> they have visited <WH6485> you. <WH6694> They poured out a prayer <WH3908> when your chastening was on them. <WH4148>

Like <WH3644> as a woman with child, <WH2030> who draws near <WH7126> the time of her delivery, <WH3205> is in pain <WH2342> and cries out <WH2199> in her pangs; <WH2256> so we have been before <WH6440> you, <WH3068> Yahweh.

We have been with child. <WH2029> We have been in pain. <WH2342> We gave birth, <WH3205> it seems, <WH3644> only to wind. <WH7307> We have not worked <WH6213> any deliverance <WH3444> in the earth; <WH776> neither <WH1077> have the inhabitants <WH3427> of the world <WH8398> fallen. <WH5307>

Your dead <WH4191> shall live. <WH2421> My dead bodies <WH5038> shall arise. <WH6965> Awake <WH6974> and sing, <WH7442> you who dwell <WH7931> in the dust; <WH6083> for your dew <WH2919> is like the dew <WH2919> of herbs, <WH219> and the earth <WH776> will cast forth <WH5307> the dead. <WH7496>

Come, <WH3212> my people, <WH5971> enter <WH935> into your rooms, <WH2315> and shut <WH5462> your doors <WH1817> behind you. <WH2247> Hide yourself for a little <WH4592> moment, <WH7281> until the indignation <WH2195> is past. <WH5674>

For, <WH3068> behold, Yahweh comes forth out <WH3318> of his place <WH4725> to punish <WH6485> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the earth <WH776> for their iniquity. <WH5771> The earth <WH776> also will disclose <WH1540> her blood, <WH1818> and will no longer cover <WH3680> her slain. <WH2026>
